books.name: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.blurb: The story follows the shepherd boy Santiago in his journey across North Africa to the Egyptian pyramids after he dreams of finding treasure there.

books.name: The Guest List
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.blurb: A wedding celebration turns dark and deadly in this deliciously wicked and atmospheric thriller reminiscent of Agatha Christie.

books.name: I'm Glad My Mom Died
books.author: Jennette McCurdy
books.blurb: A heartbreaking and hilarious memoir about her struggles as a former child actor—including eating disorders, addiction, and a complicated relationship with her overbearing mother.
